entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening and before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
